name: Portal Arena Shooter
description:
A simple team deathmatch shooter game, but the world is not as it seems! Infinite staircases, rooms that are bigger on the inside, and impossible geometry are all featured in this prototype game. Would you ambush an enemy by warping behind him? Or would you evade an attacker in an impossible room? Try out new strategies in this mind-twisting game!

This game is in development, and is not feature complete yet. Alpha 1.0 features AI bots only, though multiplayer and many other improvements are planned for version 2.0. Bugs are to be expected! Follow my progress on Twitter: https://twitter.com/limdingwen

This game is open source on Github: https://github.com/limdingwen/Portal-Arena-Shooter
